response.original_title: Demos: An Independent Artist's Guide to Success
response.overview: Documentary / Music/Musical - Tastemakers with expertise that crisscross all aspects of the music business ranging from entertainment managers, public relations executives and a host of artists including Talib Kweli, Pete Rock and CL Smooth, Naughty by Nature, the legendary Marley Marl, and more to be revealed, will give first-hand opinions on where the industry is going and how to make in the new music business.
response.title: Demos: An Independent Artist's Guide to Success
